description:
This is not your average crew. In fact, it's not even your average fleece. That's because it has a little secret, and it's called Cardiff fabric.

Why is this such a big deal? Because you get to enjoy that well-loved, pre-broken-in feeling from wear number one. Made from bestselling Cardiff fabric—with naturally bacteria resistant hemp—this men's style makes everyday outfitting easy.
name: Prana Cardiff Fleece Crew - Mens
